sentences.sentence: The value of China increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while Japan, India, America and Dutch decrease between 2010 and 2012.
The value of Japan, India, America and Dutch is greatly lower than China in 2010, 2011 and 2012.

sentences.sentence: The value of China increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while Japan, India, America and Dutch decrease between 2010 and 2012.
The value of Japan, India, America and Dutch is greatly lower than China in 2010, 2011 and 2012.
